Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature tube-shaped vase with a flat circular body, small slightly flared foot and a body that bulges slightly at the bottom and narrows near the top. Forty-seven vessels of this type were found in the same foundation deposit. Of a crude manufacture, certain vases are misshapen.
